system.description:
The inhabitants of the provinces of Bohemia, Moravia and Silesia are urban craftsmen and learned scholars. While Prague’s university is known for its occult sciences and medicine, and Olmütz for its many churches, Brünn is justly famed for its artillery school. Although they are reputed to be good-natured, it should be known that the Hussite heretics were particularly rabid enemies of the Mother Church, and their survivors yet lurk among the common people.

  • Czech Fighters and Vagabonds receive +2 to their damage with firearms and crossbows.
  • Czech Clerics and Students receive an extra Science skill, and they may earn their doctorate on the 4th level.
